<style>
        .tooltip {
          position: relative;
          display: inline-block;
          border-bottom: 1px dotted black;
        }

        .tooltip .tooltiptext {
          visibility: hidden;
          width: 120px;
          background-color: black;
          color: #fff;
          text-align: center;
          border-radius: 6px;
          padding: 5px 0;

          /* Position the tooltip */
          position: absolute;
          z-index: 1;
          top: 100%;
          left: -10%;
        }

        .tooltip:hover .tooltiptext {
          visibility: visible;
        }
</style>
